channel.title: .:[Pickup]:. -Error-
channel.description:
Can someone Help me with this error :(
[code]client.java:16764: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PickUpID location: class client if (pickUpItem(PickUpID, PickUpAmount) == true) { ^ client.java:16765: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PickUpID location: class client PickUpID = 0; ^ client.java:19395: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PickUpID location: class client PickUpID = 0; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Help aprecitated :D

item.title: .:[Pickup]:. -Error-
item.dc:creator: @fishys fishys
item.description:
@fishys wrote:

From the begining to the end of your pickup add this

[quote=“Divine-Devil, post:1, topic:152004”]else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yogo My Logo”) || playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Cmon Type It AGAIN !”);
}[/quote]
Not sure if thats what u were asking, but hope i helped

Read full topic
